sqlMap.select:
SELECT 'wo' || min(group_code) as schema, comp_domain as domain, comp_code FROM TCM0000
REAL_GROUPWARE_DOMAIN = #daoName#
GROUP BY comp_domain,comp_code

SELECT v.userindex , v.userid , '' as password , v.user_name as user_name , v.company_code as company_code , v.dept_code as dept_code , v.grade_code as grade_code , v.grade_name as grade_name , v.duty_code as duty_code , v.duty_name as duty_name , v.pos_code as pos_code , v.pos_name as pos_name , v.sex as sex , v.email as email , v.domain_name as domain_name , v.compphone_number as compphone_number , v.empno as empno , v.mobile_number as mobile_number , t2.greetings as greetings
, nvl(t.online_id, '') as online_id
, '' as online_id
FROM ( SELECT * FROM $schema$.vor1030 WHERE locale = #locale# $exclusion_sql$
AND plural = '0'
) v left outer join $schema$.tor1033 t2 on v.userindex = t2.userindex , $schema$.tor1040 t WHERE v.pos_code = t.pos_code AND v.company_code = t.company_code order by t.sort_seq, v.sort_seq
SELECT company_code , company_name , scomp_code , domain_name FROM $schema$.vor1010 WHERE locale = #locale# $exclusion_sql$ ORDER BY sort_seq ASC
SELECT company_code , pdept_code , dept_code , dept_name FROM $schema$.vor1020 WHERE locale = #locale# $exclusion_sql$ ORDER BY sort_seq ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM tma0010 a, tma0020 b, $schema$.vor1030 c WHERE a.message_id = b.message_id AND b.userindex = c.userindex AND c.email = #userid# AND c.domain_name = #domain_name# AND c.plural='0' AND c.locale = #locale# AND b.recovery_yn = '0' AND b.read_yn = '0' AND (b.boxid != 2 AND b.boxid != 3 AND b.boxid != 4 AND b.boxid != 9) AND b.is_deleted = '0' ORDER BY b.recv_date DESC

SELECT count(1) FROM $schema$.tsa2010 t1, $schema$.tsa2011 t2, $schema$.tor1030 t3, $schema$.tor1010 t4 WHERE t1.sanc_id = t2.sanc_id AND t2.line_userindex = t3.userindex AND ( t2.read_auth = '1' OR (t2.read_auth = '0' AND $schema$.f_next_wdate(t1.create_date,1,t1.writer_company_code)> sysdate )) AND t2.progress IN ('001','010') AND t2.sancyn = '0' AND t1.status IN ('001','010') AND t1.deleteyn = '0' AND t2.deleteyn = '0' AND t2.sanc_auth = '1' AND t3.COMPANY_CODE = t4.COMPANY_CODE AND t3.userid = #userid# AND t4.domain_name = #domain_name# AND t1.delegate_yn = '1'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.message_id AS message_id, a.subject AS subject, a.sender AS sender, to_char(b.recv_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS recv_date FROM tma0010 a, tma0020 b, $schema$.vor1030 c WHERE a.message_id = b.message_id AND b.userindex = c.userindex AND c.email = #userid# AND c.domain_name = #domain_name# AND c.plural='0' AND c.locale = #locale# AND b.recovery_yn = '0' AND b.read_yn = '0' AND (b.boxid != 2 AND b.boxid != 3 AND b.boxid != 4 AND b.boxid != 9) AND b.is_deleted = '0' ORDER BY b.recv_date DESC ) WHERE rownum < #query_cnt#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.sanc_id AS sanc_id, t1.subject AS subject, to_char(t1.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS create_date, t1.writer_name AS writer_name , t1.form_seq AS form_seq, t4.form_ver AS form_ver FROM $schema$.tsa2010 t1, $schema$.tsa2011 t2, $schema$.vor1030 t3, $schema$.tsa1011 t4 WHERE t1.sanc_id = t2.sanc_id AND t2.line_userindex = t3.userindex AND t1.form_seq = t4.form_seq AND ( t2.read_auth = '1' OR (t2.read_auth = '0' AND $schema$.f_next_wdate(t1.create_date,1,t1.writer_company_code)> sysdate )) AND t2.progress IN ('001','010') AND t2.sancyn = '0' AND t1.status IN ('001','101','010') AND t1.deleteyn = '0' AND t2.deleteyn = '0' AND t2.sanc_auth = '1' AND t3.email = #userid# AND t3.domain_name = #domain_name# AND t3.locale = #locale# AND t1.delegate_yn = '1' ORDER BY create_date DESC ) WHERE rownum < #query_cnt#
sqlMap.insert: insert into tor1036 ( userid, domain, id, user_name, success_yn, session_code, access_date, access_type, remote_host1, remote_host2) values (#userId#, #domain#, #pk#, #userName#, #isSuccess#, #sessionCode#, sysdate, #accessType#, #remoteIp1#, #remoteIp2#)
